result.title: Senior Vice President, Product Management-Regional Product Team P8 产品经理 - 负责东南亚区
result.description:
In our Regional Product Team, you will get to work with a young, driven, and energetic teammates that work cross-functionally and across markets to ensure the customer experience is paramount, but also that their domain drives business impact, improves quality, and solves pain points across our markets. we welcome domain product experts to join and lead this platform battle in this exciting market
You will be responsible for:
• Overall design relevant domain roadmap in both customer mindset and commercial strategy; Leverage tech ability to achieve the domain’s KPI.
• You will be engaging and collaborating with many cross domains in the product team, such as the seller, user growth, search & recommendation, Advertising, Logistics, UED, etc. to drive the customer engagement, user growth, and ensure Lazada traffic operation frameworks and efficiency, and integrate local business strategies with 6 countries in SEA.
